CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract Signed"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Enrolled"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "NSF"),ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Fees Done"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Cancelled") ), IF( ISBLANK(Cancellation_Date__c), FLOOR( (TODAY() - CloseDate) / 7 ), FLOOR( (Cancellation_Date__c - CloseDate) / 7 ) ), NULL )
CustomField.label: Retention Weeks
